elements.title: Authority Credential Badge Hero Section

visual_spec.description: Hero section displaying licensed platform badge with shield icon, quantified metrics (150+ properties, 200+ broker partners), and recognizable partner logo in a vertical stack with clear visual hierarchy
visual_spec.typography: Inter Bold 24px for badge headline, DM Sans Medium 18px for metrics, Inter Regular 16px for descriptions
visual_spec.spacing: 40px vertical rhythm between badge sections, 24px internal card padding, 16px between badge and metric
visual_spec.layout: Centered vertical stack: Shield icon (64px) ‚Üí Licensed badge headline ‚Üí Property/broker count metrics ‚Üí Partner logo grid (if applicable)

interaction_spec.default_state: Badge loads immediately with all credentials visible above fold, no animation on initial load for fast System 1 authority check
interaction_spec.hover_state: Partner logos show subtle scale (1.0 ‚Üí 1.05) on hover with 200ms transition
interaction_spec.active_state: Clicking partner logo opens case study or verification link in new tab
interaction_spec.loading_state: Not applicable - credentials must load with initial page render
interaction_spec.empty_state: Not applicable - credentials are static content
interaction_spec.error_state: If partner logo fails to load, display text name instead with same styling
interaction_spec.transitions: Smooth fade-in for partner logo section if lazy-loaded (300ms ease-out)

copy_spec.headline: Licensed Real Estate Platform
copy_spec.body: Serving 150+ properties across Manhattan, Brooklyn, and New Jersey. Trusted by 200+ professional broker partners.
copy_spec.tone: Professional authority, data-driven, not salesy. Convey legitimacy through specific numbers and verifiable credentials.

elements.html_snippet:
üõ°Ô∏è

Licensed Real Estate Platform

150+ Properties
200+ Broker Partners

Serving Manhattan, Brooklyn, and New Jersey. Trusted by professional brokers and property managers.

Partner Logo
Partner Logo
Partner Logo
üìÑ Download Partnership Agreement

before_after.before: Professional hosts arrive at discovery page skeptical, having received cold outreach. They spend first 3 minutes of evaluation call interrogating legitimacy ('Do you work with management companies?') instead of discussing economics. Discovery page lacks visible authority markers, forcing hosts to research independently.
before_after.after: Hosts verify Split Lease's legitimacy within 3 seconds of viewing partnership page through immediate visibility of licensed badge, quantified metrics (150+ properties), and recognizable partner logos. Evaluation calls open with business-focused questions ('What's the commission structure?') instead of legitimacy interrogation, saving 3+ minutes of call time and reducing defensive posture.

elements.title: Interactive ROI Calculator with Real-Time Comparison

visual_spec.description: Side-by-side comparison cards showing Traditional Broker Fee vs Split Lease Model with interactive input sliders for base rent, lease duration, and markup. Financial figures use monospace typography for precision, with multiplier badge prominently displayed in accent color.
visual_spec.typography: IBM Plex Mono 28px bold for key financial figures, Inter 20px bold for ROI multiplier badge, DM Sans 18px medium for comparison card labels, Inter 16px regular for calculator input labels
visual_spec.spacing: 60px between comparison cards (desktop), 40px vertical rhythm in calculator, 24px within cards, 16px between label and value
visual_spec.layout: Three-section vertical stack: ROI multiplier headline ‚Üí side-by-side comparison cards ‚Üí interactive calculator inputs ‚Üí conversion timeline data

interaction_spec.default_state: Calculator displays pre-populated example: $2,000 base rent, 6-month lease, $50/day markup. Comparison cards show calculated results: Traditional $2,000 upfront vs Split Lease $9,000 total. Multiplier badge displays 4.5x.
interaction_spec.hover_state: Input fields show accent border on hover, slider handles scale slightly (1.0 ‚Üí 1.1)
interaction_spec.active_state: As host types in input field, display subtle shimmer animation on comparison cards during 300ms debounce. After debounce completes, animate updated values counting up from old to new using spring easing (400ms duration).
interaction_spec.loading_state: Shimmer gradient animation on comparison cards (300ms after last keystroke during debounce) signals calculation in progress
interaction_spec.empty_state: If host clears input field, display placeholder 'e.g., $2,000' and show dashed placeholder boxes in comparison cards with helper text: 'Enter base rent to see potential commission'
interaction_spec.error_state: Invalid input (negative, non-numeric, >$50,000) displays inline error below field: 'Please enter valid monthly rent between $500-$50,000' in red. Comparison cards remain in previous valid state.
interaction_spec.transitions: 300ms debounce after last keystroke, 50ms input focus acknowledgment, 400ms value count-up animation with spring easing

copy_spec.headline: Earn 4.5x More Than Traditional Broker Fees
copy_spec.body: Model your potential earnings with our transparent ROI calculator. Adjust inputs to see how Split Lease's commission structure compares to traditional upfront broker fees.
copy_spec.tone: Data-driven transparency, not hype. Show concrete numbers and let economics speak for themselves. Acknowledge host expertise while providing guidance.

elements.html_snippet:
4.5x
More Commission Than Traditional Broker Fee
Traditional Broker Fee
$2,000
One month rent upfront
Split Lease Commission
$9,000
$50/day over 6 months
Expected Conversion Timeline
Properties priced at $100-$125/day convert in 10 days on average

before_after.before: Jessica spent 6+ minutes on evaluation call negotiating pricing because economics were unclear. She challenged Robert's expectations ('For Manhattan, it's very expensive'), asked for benchmarks ('What's the price range?'), and needed multiple clarifications on markup model. Economic uncertainty manifested as defensive questioning and delayed commitment ('I have to run it by my broker').
before_after.after: Hosts model their economics in under 2 minutes using interactive calculator before evaluation call. They arrive at calls with clear understanding of ROI comparison (4.5x traditional broker fee), specific projected commission for their inventory ($9,000 over 6 months), and confidence in pricing strategy. Evaluation calls focus on partnership logistics rather than pricing negotiation, saving 6+ minutes and enabling faster commitment decisions.

elements.title: Real-Time Pricing Guardrails with Constraint Feedback

visual_spec.description: Pricing slider with color-coded zones (green: recommended, yellow: slower conversion, red: rarely converts). Constraint callout card slides in from right when host approaches yellow/red zones, displaying specific data-driven recommendations with conversational serif typography.
visual_spec.typography: Inter 18px regular for constraint callout headline (conversational tone), DM Sans 16px medium for conversion timeline text, IBM Plex Mono 18px bold for comparable listing count, IBM Plex Mono 16px bold for specific price recommendations
visual_spec.spacing: 24px padding in constraint callout card, 16px between callout headline and recommendation, 8px between data points in recommendation
visual_spec.layout: Pricing slider (horizontal) with color zones marked by vertical lines ‚Üí conversion timeline text below slider ‚Üí constraint callout card (if in yellow/red zone) appearing to right of slider with arrow pointing to current price

interaction_spec.default_state: Pricing slider with handle positioned in green zone (accent-light background). Zone boundaries visually marked with subtle vertical lines and labels: 'Recommended range: $100-$125/day'. Below slider: 'Properties in this range convert in 10 days avg.' No guidance card visible yet.
interaction_spec.hover_state: Slider handle shows subtle shadow on hover, input field shows accent border
interaction_spec.active_state: As host drags slider handle toward yellow zone, guidance card begins to slide in from right at 80% threshold (when host is 80% of way from green to yellow boundary). Animation completes by time handle reaches yellow zone (300ms spring easing). Card opacity fades from 0 to 1 during slide-in.
interaction_spec.loading_state: Guidance card slide-in animation (300ms spring easing) provides anticipatory feedback before host fully enters problematic zone
interaction_spec.empty_state: If host hasn't interacted with slider after 30 seconds, display subtle prompt above slider: 'Based on comparable listings, we recommend $110-$120/day. Drag slider to set your price.'
interaction_spec.error_state: If host drags into red zone (30%+ above comparable avg), guidance card intensifies: background changes to signal-danger-bg, icon changes to ‚ùå, text becomes bolder. Message: 'Properties priced 30%+ above market rarely convert. Consider reducing from $180 to $125/day for 3x better visibility.'
interaction_spec.transitions: 100ms slider drag acknowledgment, 300ms guidance card slide-in with spring easing, 300ms success checkmark pulse if host adjusts back to green zone

copy_spec.headline: Pricing Optimization
copy_spec.body: Set your daily rate below. We'll show you how your pricing compares to similar properties and expected conversion times.
copy_spec.tone: Collaborative expert coaching, not system criticism. Frame constraint feedback as helpful information based on data, not as correction. Use 'Based on what's converting right now, here's an adjustment that would help this listing perform better' NOT 'This price is wrong.'

elements.html_snippet:
Pricing Optimization

Set your daily rate below. We'll show you how your pricing compares to similar properties and expected conversion times.

$80/day $125/day (Recommended) $200/day
Expected Conversion Timeline
Properties in this range convert in 10 days average
‚ö†Ô∏è
This price is above comparable properties
Reduce from $150 to $125/day
Based on 150 comparable listings, this would cut conversion time from 30 days to 10 days

before_after.before: Robert built trust with Jessica by arguing against Split Lease's short-term interests: 'Pricing things out of the market would be no interest to anybody. Start with lower-cost inventory.' This honest constraint advice built credibility but is agent-dependent. Most hosts discover pricing mistakes through failed conversions (no proposals for 7+ days), wasting time and eroding confidence in the platform.
before_after.after: All hosts receive real-time pricing guidance during listing creation through visual color zones (green/yellow/red) and data-driven constraint feedback ('This price is 20% above comparable properties. Reducing to $125/day would cut conversion time from 30 days to 10 days'). Honest guidance is systematized through product, preventing pricing errors before listings go live and building trust through transparent, collaborative optimization.
